name: Maddroid
description:
You are a hacker who tries to overthrow the government by finding secrets about corruption. 
The government tries to protect their data, and attacks us (boss fights) to know our place or IP address.
World is in the grasp of bitcoin (you pay for everything with it)
You are inside the internet/server

If you have played the game please fill this form
